name: caddymanager
description: CaddyManager is a GUI-based dashboard for managing Caddy web servers. It visualizes configurations, enables site deployment, SSL settings, and reverse proxy control through a friendly interface without editing plain configs.
features: GUI Management: Visual dashboard for Caddy server configuration. No config files needed.
Site Deployment: Deploy websites through friendly interface. Point and click.
SSL Settings: Manage SSL certificates visually. Easy security.
Reverse Proxy: Configure reverse proxies without editing configs. Visual setup.
Configuration Visualization: See your Caddy setup at a glance. Clear overview.
User-Friendly: Manage Caddy without command line expertise. Accessible to all.
